content: xx=http://www.aftonbladet.se/nyheter/article5227424.ab Link to article with a picture above, sadly no English translation. However, the Swedish corvettes HMS Malmö and HMS Stockholm have been patroling the Somali coast for a short while and did their first intervention against pirates today. Aprox 0130 at night an alarm went out from A/V Antonis, a merchant ship, stating she was under attack from pirates with RPG's and needed help. HMS Malmö and HMS Stockholm were ordered to assist her and headed to intercept. They fired warning shots with the ship guns, machineguns and an onboard sniper against the pirates who aborted the attack. A team of Swedish marines boarded the pirate ship and 7 pirates were arrested. It's great to finally be fighting the good fight!

title: Swedish navy stops Somali pirate attack
